trans-unit.source: Implement to participate in the creation or choosing of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object, especially to enable shared sessions.
trans-unit.target: Alkalmazzon a létrehozása vagy kiválasztása a részt egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> különösen ahhoz, hogy megosztott munkamenet-objektum.

trans-unit.source: Implement the IInstanceContextProvider interface to provide the appropriate <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object to the system.
trans-unit.target: Az IInstanceContextProvider illesztőfelülettel, így a megfelelő <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>objektumot a rendszer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this interface is implemented to support shared sessions, enable service instance pooling, control lifetimes of service instances, or to group contexts among clients.
trans-unit.target: Általában ez az interfész támogatja a megosztott munkamenetek, engedélyezze a service-példány készletezését, élettartama szolgáltatáspéldány, vagy a csoport környezetek között ügyfelek szabályozásához valósul meg.

trans-unit.source: For example, to implement sharing, insert a custom IInstanceContextProvider to decide which session or call from a client is associated with which <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: Például a megosztási alkalmazásához be döntse el, hogy mely munkamenet vagy ügyféltől érkező hívás, amelyhez társítva egy egyéni IInstanceContextProvider <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Például azt mutatja be, a példány környezetek-megosztás, [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When an IInstanceContextProvider is inserted into [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], the normal property that controls the creation of <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects (the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) is no longer checked and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Amikor egy IInstanceContextProvider bekerülnek [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], a normál tulajdonság, amely a létrehozásának <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumok (a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>tulajdonság) már be van jelölve, és nincs hatása.</xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceBehaviorAttribute.InstanceContextMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: A more generic mechanism by which you can initialize <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> objects when created (for example, to attach custom extensions to each <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) is the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: A több általános mechanizmus, amellyel inicializálása <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumok létrehozásakor (például egyéni kiterjesztések csatolni az egyes <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>) van a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextInitializer?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when a new message is received.
trans-unit.target: Hívható meg, ha egy új üzenet jelenik meg.

trans-unit.source: The GetExistingInstanceContext method is called when a message is received.
trans-unit.target: A GetExistingInstanceContext metódus lehívásra kerül, ha egy üzenet jelenik meg.

trans-unit.source: Return the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that you want to process the message, or `null`.
trans-unit.target: Térjen vissza a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumot, hogy szeretné-e feldolgozni az üzenetet, vagy `null`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: In the case of `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object for the message and then calls the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A következőket `null`, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] létrehoz egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumot az üzenetet, illetve a hívások a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A>metódus.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.InitializeInstanceContext%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: If you return `null`, the new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object goes through the throttling system and increments the count of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Ha ismét `null`, az új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum végighalad a sávszélesség-szabályozási rendszer, és növeli a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName> száma</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: A bejövő üzenetet.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: A csatornát, amely az üzenetet kapott.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object that is used to process the message; return <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> objektum, amely az üzenet feldolgozására szolgál; vissza <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> arra utasítani [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hozzon létre egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> is returned from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*> method.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> küld vissza a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>metódus.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext*>

trans-unit.source: InitializeInstanceContext is called when <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A> returns `null` and a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is created.
trans-unit.target: InitializeInstanceContext lesz meghívva <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>adja vissza `null` és egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum létrehozása.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.GetExistingInstanceContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called to notify you that a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has been created.
trans-unit.target: Ezt a módszert nevezik, hogy tájékoztassuk, amely egy új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>létrejött.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The new <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Az új <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext?displayProperty=fullName> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The incoming message.
trans-unit.target: A bejövő üzenetet.

trans-unit.source: The channel that received the message.
trans-unit.target: A csatornát, amely az üzenetet kapott.

trans-unit.source: Called when all <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> activities have completed to enable implementers to prevent the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> from being recycled.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva összes <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>tevékenység befejezése érdekében implementers engedélyezése a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>a újra lesznek hasznosítva.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: IsIdle is called when [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is about to close and recycle an idle <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object so that you can inform the runtime whether to continue doing so.
trans-unit.target: IsIdle lesz meghívva [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] arra készül, hogy zárja be, és hasznosítsa újra a egy üresjárati <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumot, hogy értesítheti a futtatókörnyezet hogy folytassa a műveletet lehetséges.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: For an example that demonstrates the sharing of instance contexts, see [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).
trans-unit.target: Például azt mutatja be, a példány környezetek-megosztás, [InstanceContextSharing](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4a6a46d7-b7d7-4bb5-a0dd-03ffa3cbc230).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object that is considered idle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum, amely tekinti tétlennek.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] is to close and recycle the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object and adjust the value of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] zárja be, és hasznosítsa újra a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektumra, és a beállítások értékét módosítani <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ServiceThrottle.MaxConcurrentInstances%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; ellenkező esetben <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: Called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*> method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to enable implementers to provide a callback to notify [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is finished.
trans-unit.target: Meghívva a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>metódus beolvasása <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> arra, hogy értesítse a visszahívás implementers engedélyezése [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] amikor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>objektum befejeződött.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle*>

trans-unit.source: The NotifyIdle method is called when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> method returns `false` to enable you to provide [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object that you use to inform the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work.
trans-unit.target: A NotifyIdle metódus lehívásra kerül, ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>metódus értéket ad vissza `false` ahhoz, hogy adja meg [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] rendelkező egy <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>segítségével tájékoztatja a futásidejű objektum, amely a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>befejezte a tevékenységeket.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName> object notifies the runtime that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> has finished its work, [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] calls <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> once again.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>objektum értesíti a futtatókörnyezet, amely a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>befejezte a tevékenységeket [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] hívások <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>még egyszer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This cycle continues until <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A> returns `true` and the context is closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: Ez a ciklus addig folytatódik, amíg <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>adja vissza `true` és a környezet zárva, és felhasználását.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInstanceContextProvider.IsIdle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"></xref> object that notifies [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] when the <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext> object is to be closed and recycled.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.InstanceContextIdleCallback"> </xref> tájékoztató objektum [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] amikor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>, hogy a lezárt és felhasználását.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.
trans-unit.target: Az aktuális <xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext>
